page.title: 19Stithians - Developments.
page.content: Water is important to Stithians. Now we have the reservoir just outside the village and the water used to be used for powering mills and other machinery in Kennall Vale. People came to live here because they worked on the farms, in the mills or the nearby mines. Nowadays the mills are all closed along with the quarries although some people still travel to work in the mines that are left open. Few people work on the farms because of mechanisation. Now people come to Stithians for peace and quiet and ease of travel to a number of nearby towns. Building of new houses is going on all the time and we think that the population will grow and that the school will get bigger too. Most of us think that we will move away eventually because there is not enough to do here.
